title: Blended Learning-Based Professional Development Program for Non-Mathematics Majors

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary mathematical concepts and general understanding of pedagogy
context.additional_context: A blended program for pre-/in-service elementary school teachers to strengthen secondary mathematics instruction competencies. Combines online activities using digital devices with classroom teaching.

learning_goals: Non-math major teachers can restructure and explain at least five core math concepts (integers, functions, geometry, etc.) at an elementary level
Enhance practical lesson design skills through collaborative problem-solving activities with peer teachers in blended learning environments
Utilize an online Learning Management System (LMS) to self-directively learn math educational content (videos, simulations, etc.) at least twice weekly

resources: Access to a specialized online platform for mathematics education

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
